titleStmt.title: An Exact account of the affairs of Ireland, with the particulars of the signal victory obtained by the valiant men of Enneskilling, under the command of Colonel Thomas Lloyd, on the twenty fourth of September, 1689 / in a letter from Holyhead to a friend at London.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Richard Baldwin in the Old-Baily.,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Christ Church (University of Oxford) Library (reel 2624:11) and British Library (reel 2952:23).
